ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And we are those who sing hallelujas to Him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and we are of those who glorify Allah.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And indeed we are those who say His purity.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, we (angels) indeed are those who glorify.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And we are most surely they who declare the glory (of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: we are they that give glory.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! we, even we are they who hymn His praise
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It is we who celebrate Allah’s glory.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And we are verily those who declare (Allah's) glory!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, we (angels), we are they who glorify (Allah's Praises i.e. perform prayers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And we are they who exalt (Allah)'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:166] And indeed it is we who give glory, [it is we] who declare that God transcends what does not befit Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! we, even we, are they who hymn His praise) who pray to Him
